assume risk for major bumps: Yes, but only for runtime dependencies, not dev-tools pinned by Nx. Keep Nx at ~20.0 as specified.
major version update: No, avoid major version updates. Stay on current major versions and only do minor/patch updates. Focus on adding missing dependencies (typescript and nx) to the root workspace.
add typescript and nx to workspace packa: Only update the root workspace. Do not add dependencies to individual projects.
use third party generators: No, only use internal, existing generators, scripts, and build tools referenced in our documentation.
